title: Still no news about marksmen itemization nerf ?
body: I'm tired of getting crit by 700+ AD + 500 AP by statik shiv by an undodgeable thing

replies.body:
It's a rather easy fix actually: 

* Nerf bonus attackspeed, attackspeed items are way to gold efficiënt for their price. Just keep the price but lower the attackspeed . 
**Example:** 10% on {{item:1042}}, 12% on {{item:3086}}, 12% on {{item:2015}}, 25% on {{item:3087}}, 30% on {{item:3085}}, 22% on {{item:3094}}, 30% on {{item:3006}} 
* Buff attackspeed / level, shifting their damage more into their lategame. Let's say raise the scaling / level with 0.5-1%. This would give them arround 8.5%-17% on max level. That would be more than enouge to ballance out the lost attackspeed from their items.

Making ADCs more level-dependent is not necessarily a good idea. That actually emphasizes putting them in a solo lane with access to full XP.

Rather, would like to see Zeal upgrades get more expensive (2900-3000 gold)
ADCs being in a solo lane is better anyway. If you had a dedicated 1v1 marksman lane with no supports to babysit them, that lane would be a jungler bloodbath. ADCs are so easy to gank and kill.

Okay. And that's absolutely no fun at all for any marksman. "Oh, I'm here for the first 40 minutes as literally nothing but a walking bag of gold. How *fun*".

That's not balance. Gutting a class is not balance. Gutting a champion is not balance. Making an entire class feel like absolute and total shit is not balance. Giving junglers a lane they can just run to over and over for free, nearly effortless gold is not balance.
which is why you'd still need a support to babysit the ADC. if a team opts for a solo lane ADC to rush their level then theyre taking a huge risk to be an ATM for ganks
Lol i main ad trist mid... its never a jungle bloodbath

Because you're mid. There's a huge difference.

Mid is a tenth of the size of other lanes. Sneeze too hard and you'll launch yourself from one end of it to the other. I'm pretty sure Tristana can *literally* jump from one turret's range to the other's.

Botlane or toplane, though? Pfft. Yeah. Bloodbath.

Adc's generally reach a higher level ones the support starts roaming and they catchup in experience very quickly ones the midgame arrives. Adc's where always level depended. The reason why they shifted to a duo lane was because their earlygame was to weak to survive on their own. I actually would like to see marksmen moving to a solo Q in some situations. This would again be a step further into making a teamcomp less marksmen depended.

Making attackspeed just straight out harder to get will hurt the crit ballance a lot. Currently riot managed to ballance out crit by adjusting the attackspeed numbers. If that's going to shift again it's going to hurt how realiable their damage will become.

Why is this a fix to burst? This only changes sustained damage. The burst is gonna be exactly the same.

Why not just nerf the passive magic proc damage like everyone else has been saying?

ADC main here. Please shift power around my items. I've said it before I'll say it again.

Infinity Edge is too big a spike, and easy to get early on, unlike the Mage's Rabadon's Deathcap.

Statikk Shiv is unhealthy for my class, which everyone has said why.

ADC itemization as a whole isn't diverse. At all. Its the same every game every character, with an exception of Kog'Maw.

If I'm stomping I get that easy Infinity Edge and win lane, then buy Shiv > RFC > lifesteal item

Otherwise Shiv > IE > RFC > Lifesteal item. Maybe if I'm feeling EXTRA SPICY I skip RFC.

Obviously, this is hyperbole, but I feel ADC lacks items that are there to adapt. All the "choice" items we have are hmmm do I get Armor Pen item 1 or Armor Pen item 2?

And in the miracle situation that kiting becomes an actual skill carries must have again, how about an item that promotes and rewards it?

Here's an idea that you can take with a grain of salt: PASSIVE - Escape Artist: After basic attacking an enemy champion, your next basic attack within 2 seconds gains bonus Armor Penetration (%, not lethality's flat!) based on how far you've traveled. (Self-imposed movement only, no displacements/thresh lanterns)

You still belive that RIOT has any intentions to balanced ADCs?
